name: Mattress
description: Hi, an elderly man who has only left a month to live has requested for an extra mattress as his current mattress is too thin and hurting his bones. Client is very skinny now. Appreciate a single size mattress urgently. Thank you!

passiton.name: Hospital Bed with Air Pressure Mattress
passiton.description: A single electric nursing bed for donation with an air pressure mattress. We plan to give these items together, along with all relevant accessories. Do note that there is some wear on the wiring but item is otherwise in good working condition.

name: Cabinet
description:
The client, who recently relocated to a new house, needs a cabinet to store and organize her belongings, which are currently dispersed across the living room.

Client is living alone and is struggling with her finances. She is unable to work due to poor health condition

contact.org: NTUC Health Cluster Support @ Bukit Merah
contact.name: Eileen Cheow

passiton.name: Cabinet shelf
passiton.description: Can be used as book shelf or cabinet

name: Mattress
description: 80yo Male dialysis patient with leg weakness looking for a light weight single bed mattress (preferably 3 inch thick). The current mattress is old, dirty and bulky, client has difficulty changing bed sheet by himself.

contact.name: Jordan Kek

name: Baby Cot
description: Client is currently pregnant with triplets and is due to give birth in July. She has 4 other young children and together with her husband, the family of 6 is sustaining on husbandâ€™s income as a delivery rider. With the upcoming birth of the triplets, there are foreseeable increasing financial challenges for the family in meeting their needs adequately. The family is looking for a baby cot for the triplets and will benefit from donations to alleviate the financial costs. Interested donors kindly contact social worker Theresa at 6365 8751

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Lei Hui Yun

passiton.name: Baby Spring Cot
passiton.description: Used item by previous tenant. Have to assemble from parts with light screwing. Sarong cloth will need washed and dried before donating. Self collection preferred (negotiable).

name: Geriatric chair
